actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The bugbear chief makes two attacks.

actions.name: Maul
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage  or 18 (4d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage if the target is a creature that is surprised or that can't see the bugbear.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage  or 14 (3d6 + 4) piercing damage if the target is a creature that is surprised or that can't see the bugbear.

actions.name: Move Out (1/Day)
actions.desc: The bugbear and creatures of its choice within 30 feet move up to half their Speed without provoking opportunity attacks.
